Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Storage
  • public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the file used to store task in duke.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Storage​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Storage constructor with filepath of data.

      Delete the specified task indicated by user.

      Loads the Duke data from this storage file, and returns it.

      Change the done status in task file according to the line number specified by user.
      void writeToFile​(java.lang.String textToAdd)
      Writing data into file.
      void writeToStorage​(TaskList taskList)
      write the correct format of each task to storage according to the type of task.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> load()
                               throws DukeException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        Loads the Duke data from this storage file, and returns it.
        Returns:
        Task data in file. Returns empty task list if file is empty.
        Throws:
        DukeException - errors when reading file or empty file
        java.io.IOException - loading error

      • writeToStorage

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for writing error
